properties.address: 2nd Floor Bridlington Central Library, King Street , Bridlington, East Riding of Yorkshire YO15 2DF
properties.description: Open from 25/11/2022. Our welcoming space is an adult only environment. We're open as a welcoming space once a week bringing a morning of coffee, tea, biscuits and the opportunity to socialise with other like-minded people. We're also offering an afternoon of activities you're welcome to stay for too.
